c:complexType.name: NormalizedBarChart
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Normalized Bar chart.

c:property.name: bar
c:property.c:documentation:
The normalized bar plot is the main plot of the normalized area chart, which means that its properties may be used without the "bar" property suffix.
Note: until CCC stable release 14.10.15 this property was called "nbar".

c:complexType.name: NormalizedBarPlot
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Normalized Bar plot.

c:property.name: stacked
c:property.c:documentation: This plot type is necessarily stacked.

c:property.name: valuesNormalized
c:property.c:documentation: This plot's values are necessarily normalized.
